jobs.title: Technical Writer/Editor
jobs.description:
Scotch Development is a web development blog discussing all things programming, development, web, and life. Scotch.io provides high quality and easy to understand content for web developers.

I work at Scotch.io as a technical writer, utilizing my vast knowledge in programming to educate developers on the platform. Here I create concise, easy to understand and high quality articles, tutorials and courses which can be consumed on the platform.

As a result of my experience writing for scotch and other notable web development platforms, I was elevated to join the ranks of experienced editors at Scotch. Now, this involved the thorough evaluation of articles and courses submitted by individuals to be published on the blog.

It is really fun to work for Scotch I must say!

jobs.title: Customer Success Engineer
jobs.description:
Auth0 is an authentication and identity management company with headquarters situated in Seattle, London, and Buenos Aires. Auth0 solves the most complex identity use cases with an extensible and easy to integrate platform that secures billions of logins every month.

At Auth0 I worked as a Technical Writer/Customer Success Engineer. As a technical writer, writing about new and emerging technologies was my primary objective as well as developing effective and efficient user documentations, tutorials and guides.

As a Customer Success Manager, I was responsible for driving engagement, adoption and retention. This was achieved with other team members by managing the SDKs used by developers to integrate Auth0 on their platforms.

jobs.title: Technical Writer
jobs.description:
deepstreamHub is a cloud-platform that enables developers to build a new generation of realtime apps – applications that synchronize data within milliseconds of it becoming available. Catering for use cases from news websites, messaging and collaboration apps to financial trading, multiplayer gaming and the industrial IoT, deepstreamHub offers a realtime datastore that synchronizes updates between browsers, mobile apps and backend processes faster than the user’s screen can refresh.

At deepstreamHub, i held the position of a technical writer. My job roles were:

  • Write quality driven tutorials and blog posts for a technical audience.
  • Work with PR and customers on case studies and user stories
  • Create high-level content to help position deepstreamHub within the wider technology ecosystem.
  • Work on conceptualizing, structuring and creating comprehensive guide books.
  • Perform competitive research to identify opportunities and make appropriate recommendations

jobs.title: Developer Evangelist/Writer
jobs.description:
Cloudinary is a cloud service that offers a solution to a web application’s entire image management pipeline.

Easily upload images to the cloud. Automatically perform smart image resizing, cropping and conversion without installing any complex software. Integrate Facebook or Twitter profile image extraction in a snap, in any dimension and style to match your website’s graphics requirements. Images are seamlessly delivered through a fast CDN, and much much more.
Working with Cloudinary has been an amazing experience.

As a developer evangelist and technical writer, I create tech content for publications such as articles, tutorials, and documentation which are showcased on the Cloudinary blog and other channels while working closely with other members of the Cloudinary team.

Also with the help of Cloudinary, I educate developers by conducting several technical meetups such as the Angular Nigeria Meetup and the Forloop Lagos meetup.

Overall I am a Cloudinary ambassador. Gathering feedback on the use of Cloudinary’s service is also paramount and partnering with similar communities and developer ecosystem on the use of Cloudinary, essential.
